website_summaries.verdict: The Tabeo kids tablet is backed by Toys "R" Us, but aside from that, there's not much to like about this small Android tablet.
pros: Preloaded with apps and educational content

customer_reviews.title: Kurio Kids Tablet...Not just for the Kids.
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I read other reviews which had mixed feelings so we purchased the 3 year replacement contracts. So far we are impressed with the ease of use, programming and construction. As with everything else it should be used responsibly and cared for. I read someones review that said it was a toy, which they are not. They are children s computers. Although we have had limited experience they have been greatly enjoyed with no problems coming up as of yet. I want one for myself. Some of the games are challenging even for adults.
customer_reviews.author: rcrmm380

customer_reviews.title: Nice, has preloaded games but app store platform is expired.
customer_reviews.text: First of all , great seller.. fast delivery!! Overall this is a good starter tablet for small kids. I had bought one of these for my youngest son when he was small and we loved it but now that I have bought it for my grandson..... the Slideme app platform has expired and I have not figured out how to install extra games.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Stiner

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the tablet for my granddaughter for her holiday gift. She carries it with her all the time and it is absolutely her favorite gift. She is a beautiful four (4) years old angel. She loves it so much that her mother told me she sleeps with the tablet and her favorite blanket. Very pleased with the ability to use filters - even her mother is happy helping her use it, however my angel won't let anyone else hold the tablet for very long. She politely says that her Grannie gave that to her and to give it back. I'm so happy I could give her a first 'computer'. She calls it her computer so that's fine by me.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Nice tab for kids
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little tablet for children --- only problem with this one is that it will not charge --- it charged at first and worked reallly well - LOVE the parental control in that of like a 'timer' so they (the kids) are not on it for too long at a time --- but after couple days it wound not re-charge when connected - will have to return it and request an exchange - but want another one just like this one -- and hope the re-charge part of it will work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Wiliam Myers

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE!
customer_reviews.text: Worst tablets I've ever bought. Nothing works on them. No google play store option. These tablets are garbage. My kids hate them ans so so i. Also the ones i bought were supposed to be brand new and they obviously weren't bcthe boxes were opened and the tablets themselves were opened and messed with. When i bought them one of them didnt even work and i had to email for a replacement! And the other one the speaker stopped working and now the company wont even email me back for a refund! Worst waste of money ever!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great product for its value
customer_reviews.text: This is my third tablet. I’m very satisfied with the product but most of all the price is decent.
customer_reviews.author: Juan M.

customer_reviews.title: Poor tablet for children
customer_reviews.text: The rating I read in regards to the kurio tablet encouraged me to purchase two of them for my two grand girls. But since they received them for Christmas , I now know that I should of purchased them something much better, it is very difficult to down load games , the volume on this kurio "SUCKS" when the girls play games or the tablet is reading stories , the house has to be completely quite in order for them to hear it . Also the battery life sucks ! Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: yvonne mouton

customer_reviews.title: kurio kids tablet super fans right here
customer_reviews.text: our older daughter was bought one by her mother and she loves it but her sister would constantly try to take it so we broke down and got one for her even though we were apprehensive since shes only 2 but it was worth it. she can opperate most toddler apps on her own and my older daughter can read and use age appropriate apps too. we just love this tablet so very much more than any others we have ever seen in use
customer_reviews.author: Libby M. Zivkovic

customer_reviews.title: My purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very upset with this tablet. I bought two for my kids for x-mas and one just stopped working. After a few weeks the second one also stopped working. what a waste of money with 100 dollars more I should of bought them a Samsung galaxy tablet. This Kids tablet sucks. Just thinking about it makes me want to cry. Bought this for my kids thinking it was a great deal but all it was, was a WASTE OF MONEY. And my kids cry they want their tablet. Iam saving to try and buy them a new one. DO NOT BUY THIS!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: tatiana

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This is not worth the extra money. I debated between this model and a Kindle Fire. Because of the parental controls and kid friendly marketing the Kurio was our choice for our 6 y/r. Compared to the Kindle Fire, the battery does not last as long, it takes longer to charge, the camera quality is very poor. Adding apps from the Amazon store was not as easy as on a Kindle. We have 3 Kindle Fires in our house and will be adding another very soon. I have returned it through the awesome help of Amazon Customer Service and will buy him a Kindle Fire HDX.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Kurio Kids Tablet
customer_reviews.text: The grandkids love it. They can play games but they can also do school work on it and read books with the parental controls and setting up how long they can play games their mom doesn't have to worry about what they are looking at. This is a great tablet for kids!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of my money
customer_reviews.text: Both my sons have one of these tablets and I absolutely don't like them! The battery on these things can be 90% or more and the thing turns off on them while they are playing a game or reading (and it does it QUITE often) and won't turn back on unless you plug the thing in. And when it is working, it runs slow. For $150.00 a pop, I think these tablets could have been better quality. For their birthdays this year I will be replacing them with the Kindle Fire. Good thing I hadn't bought one for my daughter yet!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey M. Torreyson

customer_reviews.title: Family Gift
customer_reviews.text: This has helped to assist with my daughter and keeping the kids on track with the options of profiles per family member more than the nook and the need for the children to complete reading before games. this is one of the best out there for anyone needing parental control on internet access and protecting children from going to unapproved sites.
customer_reviews.author: history seeker

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LITTLE GIFT
customer_reviews.text: BOUGHT TWO OF THESE FOR MY GRAND KIDS BIRTHDAYS. NOT AS EXPENSIVE AS AN IPAD BUT STILL VERY FUCTIONAL FOR THE KIDS. THE LITTLE ONES LOVE TO PLAY THEIR GAMES AND THE PARENTS LOVE THE PARENTAL CONTROLS THAT KEEP THE LITTLE RUG RATS FROM VENTURING TO FAR INTO THE INTERNET.
customer_reviews.author: Nene

customer_reviews.title: Kurio Kids Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this tablet for a 3yr old Autistic child, who immediately fell in love with it and refused to put it down until it needed recharging. It is very robust and comes loaded with apps to keep any child endlessly busy. It is expandable too! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Craig B.

customer_reviews.title: New name Turtle to the Snail
customer_reviews.text: This is the slowest piece of junk I ever came across. What child have the type of patient to wait at least 5 mins to turn on their tablet. I brought this for my son 3rd birthday and it was broken in less than a month. The apps are hard to download and it slow. The computer allow barely any outside game at a fast rate. The one that comes with the tablet are stupid and ridiculous, they can't keep a three year old attention. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY BUYING THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Ava

customer_reviews.title: Her Mom can control what is on it and she can play games just like the big kids do
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4 year old grand daughter and she just loves it! Her Mom can control what is on it and she can play games just like the big kids do. I will be buying another one for my grandson when he is a little older.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryle

customer_reviews.title: Great product but no google app store or google play
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this product 5 stars if it weren't for the fact you can not get google play or app store on this device, and it is not clearly stated anywhere in description. However it works exactly like a tablet, functions very smoothly and quickly between apps. Very useful setup feature allowing to control what a young child might erroneously stumble across on the net. I downloaded Amazon app store, kurio app store just doesn't have enough games of a decent quality, my son is 8, and he found them too simple!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. G. B. D'alessio

customer_reviews.title: The perfect tablet for our 7 yr old
customer_reviews.text: The perfect tablet for our 7 yr old. Lots of parental controls and great apps already downloaded. Also will grow with him as the parental controls are easily modified. We're very happy with our choice.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila D Brown

customer_reviews.title: Did not connect
customer_reviews.text: This product never connected to wi-fi. No matter where we took it, we could not get it to work. We tried to contact customer service and all we got was an email, that told us to follow the same exact steps on the set up instructions. After researching the product reviews, there are more people out there having the same connection problem. This product and their customer service, did not live up to expectations. This was suppose to be a Xmas gift for my niece and needless to say, we had to return it(after we had to pay for shipping). I was not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Letisa Cole

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with this gadget. I bought it for my nephew for his birthday and hardly 3 weeks later it just shut down and we cannot even charge it. For some reason Amazon omitted to include the receipt in the box so I figured it was impossible to return it. So I took it to the repairman and to my utter dismay he told me that it will cost more than the purchase price to repair it. I would be grateful if Amazon can advise what I should do now. I spent a lot of money on the tablet for it to be just thrown away without any compensation.
customer_reviews.author: Lindiwe Mndebele

customer_reviews.title: Kurio Kids Tablet with Android 4.0 - 7 inch 4 GB
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6 year old grandson for his birthday...it is made very well and it gets a lot of use from his 4 year old sister as well....even tho I don't like it they have thrown it across the room and it held up that abuse....I would recommend this product to anyone for a small child starting out...He loves it...and always has it in his hands....
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Look around
customer_reviews.text: It's funny how they'll cover anything but a cracked screen or lcd screen. So what are they covering then? its great for the kids and fun but not durable like they say
customer_reviews.author: Crystal J. Fink

customer_reviews.title: How much I love it
customer_reviews.text: Is better then what I expected to be my kids love it I recommended for kids and grown-ups . I As a grown up user to go to Facebook and YouTube and it has good quality
customer_reviews.author: juan

customer_reviews.title: Did not live up to expectations at all.
customer_reviews.text: Curio charger broke after two months and we had to buy a new one. Curio screen had dead pixels after six months. Definitely should have just gotten them an IPad. We kept them in cases and never took off the protective covering. Thankfully we got our money back.
customer_reviews.author: M Wilson

customer_reviews.title: This item is no good I'm so unhappy with this
customer_reviews.text: This item is no good I'm so unhappy with this. all Electronics I have bought thought amazon have been money thrown away am so disappointed that Amazon sells such products that break after six months. I will never buy any electronics or movies from amazon. Now I'm with products that is worthless. Shame on you for the mess u sold me. I believed in Amazon and trusting they sell good product not no more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased with product
customer_reviews.text: Not pleased with product... I purchased 2 units, one didn't work straight from the box. I have emailed customer service through Kurio 3 times, no one has responded. Meanwhile I have a 4 year old that would like to use his tablet. The unit continues to shut off and has to be rebooted 10-12 times in a short time span. I am highly displeased. Also shopping was every expensive and it took longer than expected to receive. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Toyoa Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Really Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I never commented but really disappointed me, buy this device Christmas gift for my 5 year old son and was excited about what it offered this tablet for my son but sadly the reality was different, the tablet promised 4 GB of storage and really only whatever with a measly 500 MB of internal storage and a 2GB internal SD, all other functions that served well but if you have no capacity for its limited storage facility. and never mind as I return would represent an expense which can not take it.
customer_reviews.author: ethaniel war

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great way to keep a child occupies! Especially with educational games.
customer_reviews.author: Marv

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TABLET
customer_reviews.text: THIS TABLET DOES WHAT ITS ADVERTISED TO DO AND THE PRICE IS RIGHT. WE BOUGHT IT FOR AN 8 YR OLD BUT ANYONE AT ANY AGE WOULD BE SATISFIED WITH THE TABLET.
customer_reviews.author: EDJUX

customer_reviews.title: great while it lasted which was about a month & ...
customer_reviews.text: great while it lasted which was about a month & a 1/2. the power jack got loose & then it wouldn't charge. I ended up throwing it away...lesson learned
customer_reviews.author: Cpt. Moonbottom

customer_reviews.title: the battery welled up and my daughter can't use it ...
customer_reviews.text: the battery welled up and my daughter can't use it anymore didn't even last a year won't every buy again
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat satisfied
customer_reviews.text: It's nice but I noticed that I'm having problems downloading loading from kurio store it stopped, but I received a email yesterday what to do but al ready mailed to grandson will send email to other grandmother on steps to fix problem, so we'll see
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: KURIO TABLET
customer_reviews.text: GRANDDAUGHTER AND HER MOTHER LOVE THE TABLET. GREAT LEARNING TOOL FOR PRESCHOOL CHILDREN. A GREAT VALUE FOR WHAT YOU GET IN PROGRAMS. WORTH EVERY PENNY.
customer_reviews.author: ACOP

customer_reviews.title: Get A Kindle or Tablet instead
customer_reviews.text: Extremely difficult for both children & adults to navigate. Too much focus on child security and not enough focus on simplicity. Screen too small grainy & dark.
customer_reviews.author: MWilliams2207

customer_reviews.title: It smell like it was burning
customer_reviews.text: broke after on day use. It smell like it was burning. I set the parental control so he could only play on it for 40 min and rest for 3 hrs.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie LaCour

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: worst product ever. Wont hold a charge, wont connect to any wifi, contacted retailer and no refunds.
customer_reviews.author: Colshephard

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 5 year old who is autistic. He is into Computers, & eletronics & he loves this, & never puts it down.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Steven Manning

customer_reviews.title: i have this kurio 7 a month its hard to ...
customer_reviews.text: i have this kurio 7 a month its hard to turn on it takes 30minutes, this thing is broke im just wasting my money,
customer_reviews.author: marie long

customer_reviews.title: he needs a better one. kurio kids tablet
customer_reviews.text: my son is almost 12 so it wasnt what we was looking for. he needs a better one.kurio kids tablet. i dont like it
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Richmond

customer_reviews.title: kurio kids tablet
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this product for family ..... kid control #1 & totally problem free device. Best hands down. You will love this product.
customer_reviews.author: connie neaves

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: It didn't take long at all to come. It came in great shape & it was gift for my cousin and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: JC Williams

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: We bought it for our daughter who is in 1st grade. It's still first day but she seems to enjoy the games on it. The case is nice. I am not concerned she will drop and break it.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: everytime i tried to down load games for my son ...
customer_reviews.text: everytime i tried to down load games for my son i would lose the internet signal...... battery life was way to short
customer_reviews.author: malissa fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my 8 year old nephew who is more computer knowledgeable then some adults. However, for reason unknown he and I have too much trouble trying to connect to the internet. Wish I had brought my nephew a Kindle.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Hall

customer_reviews.title: They like them very much
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for my grandsons for Christmas. They like them very much. The only down fall we have found so far is there are some apps we cannot download because there is no Google play
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my Grandson for Christmas in October. It worked for a week and then when you power it up it just keeps searching and does nothing. I contacted the seller in January and they will do nothing about it. I tried to contact Kurio the company and they do not answer e-mails or calls. DO NOT BUY this I could have gotten it at Walmart for less. I am calling the BBB
customer_reviews.author: Elsie

customer_reviews.title: Save your money...
customer_reviews.text: This unit arrived in such bad condition that I don't think it would even sell at a yard sale. The screen was scuffed up and when you turn it on, the colors were off kilter and there were lines through the screen. Just got it today and I'm already returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Hubert

customer_reviews.title: not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these for my son and daughter for xmas and not really happy with them. There are so many bugs that my son gets frustrated with it and doesn't want to play on it. Most of the games he wants to play don't play on this tablet. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: angelica

customer_reviews.title: should have listened to reviews
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 tablets and let my kids open them on Christmas eve, about 3 hrs of using them my 5 yr old tablet just shut off and wouldn't turn back on or charge. I'm returning it as this was her Christmas gift from me. I'm praying the other 2 don't do the same, I will keep you updated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I  am quite good but this was just
customer_reviews.text: So sorry my review was wrote on wrong item...this is their most difficult item to reset. I am quite good but this was just crazy. I still have not got it to reset.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year grandson just loved this. Now he fits eight in with the rest of the kids laying on their phones and tablets
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for children, love the time limits and parental control. Charges easy and quick. My son plays with it for hours which is good because I loaded it with educational games.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Kurio Kids
customer_reviews.text: This was for my grandson. He would rather use my husband's ipad. I don't know why but I liked his but I rate it as I see them.
customer_reviews.author: Trish Spicer

customer_reviews.title: Even a 4 year old can do it.
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect for my 4 yr old. He has adapted to it well and doesn't mess with my tablet as much.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Kurio Kids Tablet with Android 4.0 - 7-Inch 4 GB
customer_reviews.text: This is too cool. Love the parental controls and the fact that it has tons of games. Made a 10 year old's birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice tablet that is easy to use. Great for a young child's first tablet. Games are fun and appropriate. The only downside is you cannot get Netflix app on it. I would recommend this to anyone shopping for a child between 5-10 years. (My daughter is 8)
customer_reviews.author: Cortney Claire

customer_reviews.title: Make sure your children are not rough with it. Or play hard with it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 and one of them broke but my son had the most fun with his tablet and he is 3.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I think I like it better than the children I brought it for but it actually exceeded my expectations! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: mzie56

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Been only a month. My son played it only on weekends so that's about 6 use? Turns on but the screen is blank. I'm not going thru the hassle of returning n trying to get it replaced.. Over all.. Will not be ordering ever again
customer_reviews.author: sopharin may

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT ITEM AND GREAT COMPANY TO DO BUSINESS WITH
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Kurio Kids Tablet for my 7 year old grand-daughter. I opened it to charge it up and to try it out before giving it to her on Christmas. She is going to love it, especially with all of the pre-loaded games. I told my husband that it's so neat, that now I want one too.
customer_reviews.author: Eugenie Randall

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't able to program this tablet after several hours. Poor instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Maggiegirl

customer_reviews.title: not as kid friendly as I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this thinking it would be sturdier than other tablets. I also loved the idea of the parental controls. Well after a week, the screen was malfunctioning. Not really sure what happened but my son denies that it was dropped, stepped on etc. He is 7 so who knows. I am in the process of discussing how to get a replacement w/ Kurio. Parents beware. It is still a tablet that needs to be carefully handled. Don't be fooled by the bumper.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy used
customer_reviews.text: This came with a bad battery so it doesn't connect to the internet or hold a charge. It will cost me more to replace the battery than it would be to purchase a new Kurio. The product is not bad; however, I will not use this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: molly cerano

customer_reviews.title: ... right out back I had problems the graphics are nice and clear but there's a reddish and a greenish ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 2 year old grandson right out back I had problems the graphics are nice and clear but there's a reddish and a greenish film on the surface so its going back
customer_reviews.author: avys

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Thank you so much and delivery was really quick :-)
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Just received it in the mail, there was no bumper in the box as it said
customer_reviews.author: S.A.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This item was terrible. My child dropped it one time and it was done. Compl
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a very nice item, although different from a regular tablet it ...
customer_reviews.text: Item was shipped in a timely manner. It's a very nice item, although different from a regular tablet it takes some getting used to. Not all apps work, had to delete and reupload some apps more then once. But overall, very pleased with the shipper and how quick I received it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Scott

customer_reviews.title: I like
customer_reviews.text: I like because is good for my kid have good parent control,have good games adecuate for the age for my child and can help learn.
customer_reviews.author: Rolando Aboytes

customer_reviews.title: Bummer
customer_reviews.text: Not really impressed. It ran really slow. And most of the time the apps didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Akira Joe Eisenbrandt

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: App store sucks. Glitches turns off then on by itself occasionally. Wish i wouldnt have spent my. Money on this brand
customer_reviews.author: JEANNIE CHAMPION

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: This thing is garbage. My son has used this for a total of 3 weeks. The charging port doesn't want to work and now the screen keeps reversing itself. And of course no way to contact the original seller!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is horrible it keeps freezing up I don't recommend it to anyone don't buy this.

customer_reviews.title: work for like the first month and then it just starts glitching ...
customer_reviews.text: work for like the first month and then it just starts glitching out like crazy. it is not worth spending you money, it's pretty much trash.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Nitrix

customer_reviews.title: kurio
customer_reviews.text: The kurio is a good tool for a child but it freezes a lot when watching a movie sometimes it goes of and doesn't come on that out is a piece of crap I wouldn't recommend that any one purchase until they check the operation system on it again

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GIFT
customer_reviews.text: GOT FOR ANOTHER GRANDSON FOR CHRISTMAS HE WILL LOVE IT.

customer_reviews.title: Both Grandson's love it Kurio Kids Tablet with Android 4.0
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Kurio Kids Tablet as a Christmas Present for my 3year old grandson and his 7 year brother likes it also.

customer_reviews.title: NOT HAPPY AT ALL AND EXPECT A NEW ONE SENT AND ...
customer_reviews.text: NO THE PRODUCT DID NOT!! I WAS SENT A USED ONE WHEN I ORIGINALLY PRUCHASED A NEW ONE AND WAS NOT REFUNDED THE ENTIRE AMOUNT BACK DUE TO A RESTOCKING FEE??? NOT HAPPY AT ALL AND EXPECT A NEW ONE SENT AND A FULL REFUND!
customer_reviews.author: SHERI MCLUCKIE

customer_reviews.title: Kurio 7
customer_reviews.text: It never worked properly I'm actually returning it! Maybe if it worked it would've been a great Christmas present! Frustrating
customer_reviews.author: marisa morales

customer_reviews.title: Big appreciation from my daughter:
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift for my younger daughter's birthday. Since she had it, she had thanked me a thoudand times and I can see the appreciation and enthusiasm written all over her face. She loved it!
customer_reviews.author: David Idowu

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift satisfaction
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my granddaughter per her request. I am more than happy with the product. Gave it to her Christmas Eve and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: patricia anthony

customer_reviews.title: kept freezing and does not work at all.. ...
customer_reviews.text: kept freezing and does not work at all....bought in dec. for xmas gift and child age 6 never opened till march..30 day return had expired
customer_reviews.author: susan rebideau

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: this was a my 6 years old grandson's Christmas present. easy to set up. parents very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: mrsdoodle

customer_reviews.title: kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Comes with loaded games for their age... downloading we are still learning how to do but working to get the grasp of it but it keeps the kids busy and learning as well!
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Rohde

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: My son is a little to young for it but he can still play the games and this will also help him with reading. I'm glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: C Nichols

customer_reviews.title: My son
customer_reviews.text: The Kurio has a great interface for my son. He loves it, he spends a lot of time learning on it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Watts

customer_reviews.title: For younger kids!
customer_reviews.text: I think my kids, ages 7 & 9, are too old for the options offered. They only want items that we download and the wireless constantly shuts off...even when it shows a strong signal! It takes forever to download if it even allows us to do it!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Olsen

customer_reviews.title: ... Kids tablet for my grandkids and the were very happy and delighted to get them
customer_reviews.text: i ordered two Kurio Kids tablet for my grandkids and the were very happy and delighted to get them. But they stopped working after two months. So now I'm researching for a better brand.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet!
customer_reviews.text: Received this item in a timely manner, and my child loves it. He can do so much with it, plus I can control how long he can stay on it. I would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Rocha

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: was a fast ship and well described and the seller was very accommodating. and it is a gift for my little grandson so won't know what he thinks for another week

customer_reviews.text: I am not happy with the kurio 7 the screen is not very clear and it is blurry and it's very slow

customer_reviews.title: This is the worst Tablet I ever seen
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst Tablet I ever seen. Constantly say not connected to internet. Always freezing. Downloading from curio store is extremely slow. One word... Dissatisfied!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tamika McFadden

customer_reviews.text: this product has performance issuses.......worked for a while then you get a triangle in the center with an exclamation mark

customer_reviews.title: fine tablet for my 7 year old great grandson
customer_reviews.text: It was an early Christmas gift for him; it seems age appropriate and he is having a good time with it.

customer_reviews.title: KURIO KIDS TABLET
customer_reviews.text: IT WAS A PRESENT FOR MY 8 YR OLD GRANDDAUGHTER AND SHE ABSOLUTELY LOVES IT SHE HAS HAD NO PROBLEMS USING IT

customer_reviews.title: It is PERFECT for him
customer_reviews.text: We have a Special Needs (Downs) son who is 38. It is PERFECT for him!

customer_reviews.title: Professionally shipped and I love the price
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my 10 year old.Professionally shipped and I love the price.

customer_reviews.title: Broken Kurio
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 7 of these kurio for my grandkids for christmas and with not very much use two of them have allready broke the screen just goes black and will not do anything .I am going to have to send them back and see if they will replace them.
customer_reviews.author: lance taylor
